audioText: Nous garderons ces documents importants jusqu'à ce que vous apprenez la procédure complète.
question: When will we keep these important documents?
options: Until you learn the complete procedure
During the entire training period only
Before starting the official registration process
explanation: The correct answer is 'Until you learn the complete procedure'. The text states 'Nous garderons ces documents importants jusqu\'à ce que vous apprenez la procédure complète' - We will keep these important documents until you learn the complete procedure. 'Garderons' is the future tense of 'garder' (to keep).
source: Strategic targeting - garderons + apprendre synergy + procedures
